reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that personal data such as full name, position, company name, email address, phone number, login, IP number, and information collected via cookies or other technologies may be processed.
reply.reference: The Personal Data processed by us may include: full name, position, company name, e-mail address, phone number, login, IP number, information collected via cookies or other similar technologies or other data necessary for the verification of a person. URL: https://aexol.com/docs/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app shares Personal Data with various entities, including processing entities, controlling entities, postal operators, courier companies, and external entities for contract performance.
reply.reference: We may share your Personal Data with the following entities: processing entities in connection with activities commissioned by the Controller, controlling and supervisory entities, postal operators and courier companies, external entities for the proper performance of the contract. URL: https://aexol.com/docs/privacy-policy/
